author: Harry Craddock
description: Originally made with equal parts gin, Bénédictine and maraschino but better balanced with a tad more gin. (If making with equal parts this is a slightly sweet old-school after-dinner cocktail is best served on-the-rocks.)
name: Honolulu Cocktail No.2
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
